summary: Successfully completed GitHub deployment setup for GETNIUS Market Research Platform. Created deployment configuration files (vercel.json, env.example, DEPLOYMENT.md), committed all changes, and pushed to GitHub repository at https://github.com/gtmengine/getnius.git. Provided comprehensive deployment guide for Vercel, Netlify, and GitHub Pages options with environment variable configuration.
current_status: Project is ready for production deployment. All code is committed to GitHub and deployment configurations are in place. User can now deploy to Vercel, Netlify, or other platforms using the provided documentation and environment templates.
